Text: Thank you, works great on OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion!  By the way, this is Build 7.0.15106 (Revision 786747; August 3, 2012).

can i install it editing de host? how can i do that?
bdw felas this works with the latest updated desktop 7 too. ive got 7.0.15107

@ZerojohnnyX:

I have a feeling you didn't completely block Parallels in LittleSnitch and/or hosts file *before* you started installation.

Clean up your install, make sure you block everything Parallels-related from phoning home (Google is your friend), then reinstall.

Or just disable your net connection before you install, but you're still going to *have* to block Parallels from phoning home.
